656fd18b2b08ecd8.title: Sr. Software Engineer (FullStack)
656fd18b2b08ecd8.description:
JOB SUMMARY
We’re in the process of re-architecting both the front and back ends that power 90 million users (and growing!) and we’re seeking technologists with the skills, passion and experience to build something that’s never been built before.
The ideal candidate has shipped production software for a highly scaled, consumer facing website, and wants to apply that experience towards solving one of the most pressing problems of our time.
Essential duties and Responsibilities:
Expanding and maintaining existing software
Design, prototype and deploy scalable full stack solutions in React/Redux + Rails
Write high quality code that is modular, functional and testable; - Establish the best coding practices.
Understanding performance issues at all levels of the stack
Participating in code reviews
Mentor junior engineers
Work directly with support to solve customer problems
Write tests for existing and new code
Required or Preferred Experience/Education:
4+ years of experience in building dynamic, consumer-facing production level software for a highly scaled websites.
2+ years of experience building dynamic, consumer-facing sites using React/Redux.
3+ years of experience in Ruby on Rails.
2+ years of experience in Restful API services
Experience working in short, agile, iterative development cycles.
Experience mentoring junior engineers.
Exceptional candidates:
You have an eye for visual and/or interaction design, and maybe have even done some design work in the past
Embraces unit testing as a very valuable tool in the arsenal of a Software Engineer
Experience with MySQL a plus
Excellent communications skills
Startup experience a plus
About Edmodo
Our mission is to connect all learners to the people and resources needed to achieve their full potential. We are the world's leading global education network that provides communication, collaboration, and coaching tools for all members of the school community. We were founded in 2008 and currently have over 90 million members across 350,000+ schools in 150 countries.
So join the team that is changing how teachers and students learn - change lives, build your career and rack up the karma.

Edmodo is an equal opportunity employer and welcomes applications from all qualified individuals regardless of race, sex, disability, religion/belief, sexual orientation or age
Please note: Though submitting a resume to Edmodo implies that you are interested in a position(s), it does not imply that you are an applicant. You are not considered an applicant until you have been contacted directly by a Human Resources representative requesting that you begin the designated application process, which may involve phone and/or in-person interview(s), job-related testing, and background checking.
Edmodo does not accept unsolicited resumes from external recruiters or employment agencies. In the absence of a signed Recruitment Services Agreement, Edmodo will not consider or agree to payment of any recruiter or agency fee. In the event a recruiter or agency submits a resume or candidate without a previously signed agreement, Edmodo explicitly reserves the right to pursue and hire those candidate(s) without any financial obligation to the recruiter or agency.

3d73765ecde21f19.title: Senior Software Engineer
3d73765ecde21f19.description:
Our Team
--------

We're a small collaborative team who works closely across functions to bring new ideas and elegant solutions to complex challenges. We're nimble, continuously raising the bar and we love using data to make the best decisions.

We're pursuing a complex and meaningful problem, and we're looking for people who learn quickly and enjoy experimenting with new technologies and techniques. We're building something big here using rich data sets, game mechanics and innovative thinking.

Our values are imbued in everything we do: Be Inclusive, Be A Scientist, Raise The Bar, Always Be Improving, Lead With Humility; and Take the Keys.

Do you want to help us reinvent how students access aid for education?

What is the role?
-----------------

You'll be working in a tight-knit team in a fast-moving environment to build engaging features to motivate students and help educators drive student success. You will take an active part in planning, designing and developing fullstack features for students, high-schools and colleges. Our current technology stack includes Rails, React, Golang, Node.js, MongoDb, Postgres and AWS.

Who are you?
------------

As a Senior Fullstack Engineer you bring most of the below skills, with very strong experience in several.


You have 4+ years of professional experience and a Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience.
You're passionate about honing your craft and applying best practices.
You have professional experience with cloud computing services (AWS, Google Cloud, Azure). Bonus if that includes event-driven, messaging or serverless services.
You're great with server-side languages. We use Ruby, but your skillset may include languages such as Java, Python, PHP or Node.js.
You're skilled in a modern responsive web framework such as React, Angular or Vue.js (we use React).
You're experienced with good API design (RESTful and/or GraphQL).
You have experience with distributed web-based systems or microservice architecture.

This job is for you if you're:
------------------------------------


Collaborative: You love working with others and mentoring junior team members. You believe that the whole is greater than the sum of its parts.
Curious: You constantly question the way the world works and aren't scared to think big about how we can improve it.
Mission-Driven: You want to use your talents to make the world a better place and you're in a rush to do it.
A Maker: You love building awesome stuff. You bring your ideas to life and take pride in your craft. You're resourceful and find ways to get things done.
Not Fearful of Failure: You view failure as a step closer to figuring out what works. Taking on a huge, complex challenge excites you, even if you have no idea where to begin.

About RaiseMe
-------------

At RaiseMe, we're focused on ensuring that all students have the opportunity to achieve their college and career ambitions. We're looking for passionate, high-achievers who want to build a company that will help millions of students. If that's you, we'll want you to join our team.

Our platform allows colleges and universities to award incremental "micro-scholarships" to high school and community college students, based on academic, testing, extra-curricular, and real-world experience. Many of our students earn tens-of-thousands of dollars for college. The coolest part of our platform is how it educates students about the possibility of college in the first place.

We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status. If there are preparations we can make to help ensure you have a comfortable and positive interview experience, please let us know.

7e364119e8156d49.title: Senior Fullstack Engineer
7e364119e8156d49.description:
We are building software for physical space that uses data and technology at each point in the building process, such that it can make better sourcing decisions, improve its designs, build faster and smarter, and ultimately improve the lives of the people working within its buildings. Our state of the art technologies and dedication to technological innovation are key reasons why WeWork has been able to scale from operating one workspace location to more than 210 in just over eight years.

The mission of Real Estate & Development is to enable our teams across real estate, architecture, design, construction, and project management with the most up to date technology. Our technology allows for a better ability to source new deals, close those deals, design and build more efficiently, and manage the construction process end to end. We're supporting the core business here in RedTech and would love to have you on the team!

Are you someone with a strong creative streak? Do you enjoy fast paced exciting environments? Are you looking to contribute to making a real impact across many different communities and cultures around the world with the work that you're doing? If so, then we may have the opportunity for you.

In this role you will -

Build scalable, performant, reusable & testable components
Research new technology, build prototypes, and write clean, maintainable code
Work closely with product owner and product designer to review requirements & designs and break down work
Support and solve issues (process & system), identify root cause, and actively implement balanced corrective actions
Work with team to influence technology direction.
Use full stack with consumer grade UX/UI solutions and practices to engage and delight our internal platform users.
Qualifications
Experience with service-oriented architecture and web application/services/mobile development
Experience working in a UNIX/Linux environment
Understanding of performance tradeoffs, load balancing, and operational issues
Able to drive sprints / multiple sprints given strategic direction
Ability to clearly and concisely communicate with technical and non-technical stakeholders across all levels of the organization
Deep understanding of Cloud technologies (K8s, ECS, CloudFormation, IAM, etc. a plus)
Experience with Docker (nice to have)
Requirements

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field is required (MS is a plus).
Minimum 5+ years of experience building highly available critical systems.
Deep understanding of CS fundamentals (data structures, algorithms and programming languages)
At least two years worth of experience in most of the following areas:
Service oriented architecture, web services, and web application/services development
Object Oriented Analysis and Design (OOA/OOD) and Design Patterns
Messaging and asynchronous architectures, building RESTful APIs and micro-services
Developing distributed/scalable solutions, in multi-threaded, high-volume transaction systems
Performance tradeoffs, load balancing, and operational issues (latency and availability)
Java, PHP, Kotlin, REST, Ruby, Spring, SQL, ReactJS or similar web frameworks
